subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Lincecum pitched his second no-hitter against the San Diego Padres in less than a year, allowing only one runner on Wednesday and leading the San Francisco Giants to a 4-0 win.
snippet: Tim Lincecum pitched his second no-hitter against the San Diego Padres in less than a year, allowing only one runner on Wednesday and leading the San Francisco Giants to a 4-0 win.
